## CredentialManager.createRefreshCredentials() method

Creates a set of refresh authentication credentials using the specified input data.

**Signature:**

```typescript
createRefreshCredentials(inputs?: RefreshCredentialsInput): RefreshAuthInfo;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  inputs | [RefreshCredentialsInput](./foundation-comms.refreshcredentialsinput.md) | _(Optional)_ The custom input data to use when creating the credentials, if any. |

**Returns:**

[RefreshAuthInfo](./foundation-comms.refreshauthinfo.md)

A set of refresh authentication credentials.
